org.youscope.common.saving

Interface MeasurementSaver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface MeasurementSaver
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface providing functionality to set and determine the way images and meta information of a measurement are saved to the file system.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MeasurementConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration of the measurement, or null if the configuration is unknown.
      java.lang.String getLastMeasurementFolder()
      Returns the path to the last run of this measurement.

      Returns an image listener which can be added to an image producing job to save all produced images to the disk.

      Returns the current settings how the measurement should be saved to the disk (e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • getSaveImageListener

        ImageListener getSaveImageListener(java.lang.String imageSaveName)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns an image listener which can be added to an image producing job to save all produced images to the disk.
        Parameters:
        imageSaveName - The name of the imaging job which is producing the images. Should not contain a file type.
        Returns:
        An image listener which can be added to the job created by the respective configuration to save the images, or null, if the listener could not be constructed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getSaveTableListener

        TableListener getSaveTableListener(java.lang.String tableSaveName)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a table listener which can be added to an table data producing job to save all produced data to the disk.
        Parameters:
        tableSaveName - The name of the table generating job. Should not contain a file type.
        Returns:
        A table data listener which can be added to the job created by the respective configuration to save table data, or null, if the listener could not be constructed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setSaveSettings

        void setSaveSettings(SaveSettings saveSettings)
              throws MeasurementRunningException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the settings how the measurement should be saved to the disk (e.g. in which folder, ...). Set to null if measurement should not be saved.
        Parameters:
        saveSettings - Settings how the measurement should be saved.
        Throws:
        MeasurementRunningException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getSaveSettings

        SaveSettings getSaveSettings()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the current settings how the measurement should be saved to the disk (e.g. in which folder, ...), or null if measurement should not be saved.
        Returns:
        Current measurement save settings.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getLastMeasurementFolder

        java.lang.String getLastMeasurementFolder()
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the path to the last run of this measurement. This path is composed of the path in the MeasurementSaveSettings, with an additional subfolder added which indicates the time of the last execution of this measurement. Be aware that when running the server and the client on different computers, this path is relative to the server's file system.
        Returns:
        The path of the measurement on the server side.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getConfiguration

        MeasurementConfiguration getConfiguration()
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the configuration of the measurement, or null if the configuration is unknown.
        Returns:
        Configuration of the measurement.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setConfiguration

        void setConfiguration(MeasurementConfiguration configuration)
               throws MeasurementRunningException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the configuration of the measurement. The configuration should be such, that a new measurement should be possible to be created with it which has the same properties as the current measurement.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of the measurement, or null if the configuration should be set to unknown.
        Throws:
        MeasurementRunningException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
